media:group.media:title: MIND GAMES
media:group.media:description:
Our elite sports stars – what’s life like without a team or a training partner or any chance to travel?
We’re with boxer Joseph Parker, canoeist Lisa Carrington, surfer Ella Williams, and All Blacks players Damian McKenzie and Anton Lienert-Brown...
